summary: Iteration 15 testing complete. Tested all new features: Dashboard KPI charts with project_numbers, combination grouping, clickable bars for drill-down, comparison mode, Projects page filters (Sales Manager, Project Type, Technology), Sales Manager in View Summary dialog, and notification bell changes.

issues: Console warnings about invalid HTML nesting (<tr> inside <span>). This is a hydration warning from the Sales Manager Leaderboard table.
Console warnings: 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0' - this may indicate chart sizing issues during initial render but charts display correctly after load.

critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard leaderboard table has invalid HTML structure - <span> wrapper around <tr> causing React hydration warnings. Consider restructuring the map iteration to avoid span wrappers inside tbody.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 15 added: 1) project_numbers array in all KPI data (technology_data, project_type_data, location_data, sales_manager_data), 2) combination grouping for KPIs (e.g., 'AE, SA' as one bar), 3) clickable bars navigate to /projects?filter_type=X&filter_value=Y, 4) /api/dashboard/compare endpoint for period comparison, 5) Projects page filters for Sales Manager, Project Type, Technology, 6) Sales Manager field in View Summary dialog, 7) Notification bell shows all notifications (read+unread). All features tested and working.

features_tested.dashboard_kpi_project_numbers: PASS - All KPI data includes project_numbers arrays in API response
features_tested.dashboard_combination_grouping: PASS - Location chart shows combination keys like 'AE, SA', 'AE, OM'
features_tested.dashboard_no_notification_panel: PASS - Recent Notifications panel removed from dashboard
features_tested.bell_icon_notifications: PASS - Bell icon opens popover with notifications
features_tested.dashboard_compare_periods: PASS - Comparison panel opens, accepts dates, shows results with delta indicators
features_tested.projects_url_filter_params: PASS - Projects page applies filter from URL params (filter_type, filter_value)
features_tested.projects_filter_dropdowns: PASS - Sales Manager, Project Type, Technology filter dropdowns present and functional
features_tested.view_summary_sales_manager: PASS - Sales Manager field displayed in View Summary dialog on ProjectEstimator page
